title: India to Bharat LIVE Updates: Jaishankar says connotation of 'Bharat' reflected in Constitution
selftext:
Invitations for a G20 dinner has triggered a political slugfest ahead of the key G20 Summit and Parliament special session. What's the controversy? As per sources, invitations was sent in the name of 'President of Bharat' instead of the customary 'President of India. As the information came to light, the Opposition alleged that the Modi government is planning to drop India and stay with just Bharat as the country's name. Meanwhile, speculations are rife that the government may also bring a resolution in Parliament to "rename" India as 'Bharat'.
